name: Add a new row to a Google Sheets spreadsheet from a new time entries in Atarim
description:
This template periodically checks for new time entries in Atarim and uses the retrieved information to add new rows to a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

The template uses this [example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ueqAyQWY-uu6k298Eb8FWs5tu8IS2shtPey991ydsjA/edit?usp=sharing). You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
